(Original) Neat window into their operations. Educational and succinct. Can easily be fit into your day plans going to the rest of the botanical gardens.

topComments.author: Cherie Hung

topComments.author: Rosemary Shapiro-Liu
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uma das descobertas mais emocionantes em South Sydney. Adequado para adultos e crian√ßas, com fatos fascinantes sobre plantas e exposi√ß√µes interessantes. A √°rea do visitante pode ser examinada dentro de uma hora e, nesse tempo, a pessoa sai com √≥timas informa√ß√µes. √â um √≥timo pr√©dio tamb√©m. Amamos o jardim de musgo e l√≠quen.  (Original) One of the most exciting discoveries in South Sydney. Suitable for adults and children, with fascinating plant facts and interesting displays. The visitor's area can be perused within an hour, and in that time one comes away with great info. It's a great building too. Loved the moss and lichen garden.

topComments.author: Sameth Por
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lugar muito interessante. Existem apenas alguns bancos de sementes no mundo e h√° um em Sydney! Apenas Uau! Dentro do lugar √© super legal, d√° para ver onde os cientistas coletam sementes, etc. Eu estava l√° para um evento privado e acomodou cerca de 120 de n√≥s para jantar. Eu estarei definitivamente voltando para passar mais tempo.  (Original) Really interesting place. There's only a few seed banks in the world and there's one in Sydney! Just wow! Inside the place is super cool, you can see where scientists collect seeds, etc. I was there for a private function and it fitted about 120 of us for dining. I will be definitely going back to spend more time.

topComments.author: J.P. Manalo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta √© antes de mais nada uma instala√ß√£o de pesquisa cient√≠fica.  H√° passeios aqui, diariamente, √†s 11 horas e √†s 13 horas. Os guias tur√≠sticos s√£o muito experientes e muito entusiasmados. Os passeios t√™m dura√ß√£o aproximada de uma hora e contemplam o pr√≥prio pr√©dio do PlantBank e o jardim de pesquisa. O viveiro adjacente √© discutido durante o passeio e h√° janelas grandes onde √© poss√≠vel observar as pessoas que trabalham nos laborat√≥rios do PlantBank.  Uma √°rea de laborat√≥rio e uma grande sala de confer√™ncias adjacente (com WiFi e projetor) est√£o dispon√≠veis para loca√ß√£o.  (Original) This is first and foremost a scientific research facility.  There are tours here, daily, at 11 am and at 1pm. The tour guides are very knowledgeable and very enthusiastic. The tours are approximately one hour in length, and take in the PlantBank building itself and the research garden. The adjacent nursery is discussed during the tour, and there are large windows where you can observe the people working in the PlantBank laboratories.  A laboratory area and adjacent large conference room (with WiFi and projector) is available for hire.

Breathe .

(Original) Chances are, if you are going here, you're either a school student on an excursion or you're interested in botany/conservation etc. Providing that you are in fact into this sort of thing, it's a nice place to visit.
